meanings.definition: The process or activity of managing and organizing tasks or resources.
meanings.sent1: In our school, the administrations work hard to keep everything running smoothly.
meanings.sent2: Effective administrations are crucial for the success of any business.
meanings.sent3: The administrations decided to have a pizza party every Friday to boost morale.
meanings.sent4: Her administrations of the project were like a well-oiled machine, ensuring everything was done on time.
meanings.sent5: The administrations of the event were so efficient that everyone was impressed.

meanings.definition: The officials in a government or organization responsible for carrying out policies and decisions.
meanings.sent1: The administrations met to discuss the new policy changes.
meanings.sent2: Corrupt administrations can lead to chaos and instability in a country.
meanings.sent3: The administrations were surprised by the sudden influx of new regulations.
meanings.sent4: The administrations of the company were like a team of superheroes, always ready to tackle any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The administrations were praised for their transparency and accountability.

meanings.definition: The period of time during which a particular person or group is in power.
meanings.sent1: During their administrations, many changes were implemented.
meanings.sent2: The administrations of different rulers can vary greatly in their impact on society.
meanings.sent3: The administrations of the student council were known for their creative initiatives.
meanings.sent4: Her administrations as class president were marked by unity and progress.
meanings.sent5: The administrations of the past left a lasting legacy on the country.
